name: Cider Cocktail: Uncle Buck
description: The Uncle Buck was inspired by the fantastic Hudson Buck cocktail served at Brooklyn's The Vanderbuilt. While the quantities vary slightly, the main difference in the Uncle Buck is the inclusion of sparkling cider, which adds a lightness to the cocktail and a slight effervescence to help refresh the palate.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a rocks glass with ice. Pour the rye over the ice and stir gently.
Add two drops of hot water to the cider molasses and stir to loosen. Add cider molasses, Allspice Dram, and ginger beer to the glass. Stir until combined. Top with cider and serve.
